# calibration package

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This goal of calibration package is to evaluate the calibration performance and recalibrate. With this package, you can perform a calibration plot, the Hosmer-Lemeshow test,  and the calibration slope to evaluate calibration from probabilistic classification. And you can use Platt Scaling and isotonic regression method to calibrate the probabilities.

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("liuhongwei2018/calibration")
```
